alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wichita County through 1030 PM CDT... At 957 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Leoti. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Wichita County, including the following locations... Lydia, Marienthal and Selkirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Kansas.
